tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had a good experience at Shree's dental clinic for the two root canal and subsequent crown fitting done recently. I found Dr Sridevi and her team to be very professional and efficient. Dr Sridevi was patient and made sure that I was comfortable and happy with the results even if that meant taking more time. I recommend her as a friendly and capable Dentist for folks in the vicinity of this clinic.

tags: Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor Sridevi is very polite and professional in her approach. She explains the treatment process clearly before starting the treatment. She ensures that the patient is comfortable. According to my mother who underwent the Dental cleaning.,it was painless and we'll done.

The clinic is nice and modern with the facilities required for all the treatments offer by the Doctor. She also ensures the equipment is sterile and special care is taken to discard some of the used dental tools. She follows the ethics and principles from UK.

She also suggests many natural remedies  and healthy practices rather than giving us a huge list of medicines to purchase. Also there is no pressurising on unwanted treatment. She explains and gives us the option to chose depending on the variables.
reply_text: Thank you very much for taking the time to review us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I was visiting from abroad and had to have an emergency root canal which could not be postponed because of extreme pain and swelling. Dr. Shree was able to take me in the same day and did part 1 of the root canal that stopped the pain and swelling. Within 5 days Dr. Shree completed the rest of the root canal process including the cap.

I liked that her office is very clean, her manner friendly and professional, she makes her patients feel comfortable, answers questions and even stayed late to accomplish the process because of my tight schedule. She went above and beyond. I highly recommend Dr.Shree especially to those visiting from abroad.
reply_text: Thank you very much for taking the time to review us

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had a dental implant way back in the year 2011 at Dr.Gowd's Hospital, Hyderabad.  And the crown has fallen off during the year 2018.  Since I am in Chennai I have visited the dental hospitals here and twice the the crown fixation again came off.  Finally when I visited Dr.Sridevi of The Shree's clinic she has taken the extra effort to understand the root cause of the fall and also coordinated with Dr.Gowd as to the nature of implant and ensured that the re-fixation of the crown was very successful.  Till date no further issues to my teeth after this re-fixation.
reply_text: Thank you very much for taking the time to review the service.
